trans-unit.source: TOC creation and management
trans-unit.target: TOC creation and management

trans-unit.source: TOC.md is used to define the Table of Contents (TOC) structure of a docset.
trans-unit.target: TOC.md is used to define the Table of Contents (TOC) structure of a docset.

trans-unit.source: The TOC is described in Markdown format.
trans-unit.target: The TOC is described in Markdown format.

trans-unit.source: We use Markdown headers to specify the level of the TOC.
trans-unit.target: We use Markdown headers to specify the level of the TOC.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: The above example illustrates a parent topic "Tutorial" with three children Step 1-3.
trans-unit.target: The above example illustrates a parent topic "Tutorial" with three children Step 1-3.

trans-unit.source: We use standard Markdown link syntax to specify the target topic of the toc node.
trans-unit.target: We use standard Markdown link syntax to specify the target topic of the toc node.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: If a toc node is not a link, it will become a container node: it can contain children and it will be just a expanding/collapsing node.
trans-unit.target: If a toc node is not a link, it will become a container node: it can contain children and it will be just a expanding/collapsing node.

trans-unit.source: Important information
trans-unit.target: Important information

trans-unit.source: The TOC for Open Publishing is a self-contained TOC not integrated into the global MSDN/TN TOC.
trans-unit.target: The TOC for Open Publishing is a self-contained TOC not integrated into the global MSDN/TN TOC.

trans-unit.source: You can use an external link to connect the Open Publishing TOC to your MSDN/TN Global TOC.
trans-unit.target: You can use an external link to connect the Open Publishing TOC to your MSDN/TN Global TOC.

trans-unit.source: Since Markdown only supports 6 levels of header, we'll only support 6 levels of TOC for now.
trans-unit.target: Since Markdown only supports 6 levels of header, we'll only support 6 levels of TOC for now.

trans-unit.source: This can be extended in the future.
trans-unit.target: This can be extended in the future.

trans-unit.source: You cannot reference a file outside a docset/folder.
trans-unit.target: You cannot reference a file outside a docset/folder.

trans-unit.source: TOC.md cannot contain arbitrary Markdown content.
trans-unit.target: TOC.md cannot contain arbitrary Markdown content.

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot have images in it.
trans-unit.target: For example, you cannot have images in it.

trans-unit.source: All content that are not headers will lead to build error.
trans-unit.target: All content that are not headers will lead to build error.

trans-unit.source: Localized TOC
trans-unit.target: Localized TOC

trans-unit.source: Localized TOC is maintained in sync with English via the handoff and handback process.
trans-unit.target: Localized TOC is maintained in sync with English via the handoff and handback process.

trans-unit.source: TOC.md will be included in the handoff package.
trans-unit.target: TOC.md will be included in the handoff package.
